thread.title: Ultimate road trip itinerary takes travellers to all hotspots between NYC and LA
thread.title_full: Ultimate road trip itinerary takes travellers to all hotspots between NYC and LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Katie Amey for MailOnline
title: Ultimate road trip itinerary takes travellers to all hotspots between NYC and LA
text:
1
View
comments
For those seeking an epic end-of-summer road trip, look no further.
UK competition site, MyOffers, has drafted an itinerary for the ultimate 30 day road trip across the entire continental United States - and no stone has been left unturned.
Beginning in New York City and ending in Los Angeles, the proposed itinerary takes intrepid travellers through the nation's historical capital and the jazz-loving city of New Orleans all the way to Arizona's Grand Canyon and California's picturesque Pacific Coast Highway.
Beginning New York and ending in LA, the proposed road trip itinerary concludes with a drive along the majestic Pacific Coast Highway in California
The comprehensive infographic also provides suggestions of local sights, restaurants and beloved tourist attractions to take in en route.
This also includes some of America's most iconic landmarks: the Golden Gate Bridge, the White House and the Alamo.
 Next Pictured: The incredible 82ft-tall hotel aquarium in Berlin... 'I want to wave at my boss from the bar': The most hilarious... Food for thought! One-fifth of Brits admit that local... Passenger sneaked cat into the UK from Greece by hiding it... And, of course, it will take you through an impressive four different time zones.
But a word of warning: this journey is definitely not for those short on time. Still, what better way to experience all that the United States has to offer?
